position7.upright: The Three of Pentacles indicates that the outcome of the career journey will be shaped by collaboration, teamwork and the acquisition of expertise.
position7.reversed: The Three of Pentacles reversed can make success difficult as a result of lack of cooperation or loneliness.
position7.context: The result will be developing expertise with team support.

position1.upright: The Four of Pentacles symbolize trust and ownership. You may be looking for stability in your career and want to protect what you have achieved.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Four of Pentacles may indicate that you are acting out of excessive control or fear of loss.
position1.context: Your real career should give you confidence while also offering growth opportunity.

position2.upright: The Four of Pentacles advises you to establish a secure foundation for growth. Move forward by preserving your material and spiritual values.
position2.reversed: The Reversed Four of Pentacles indicates that excessive conservatism or fear of change will slow down development.
position2.context: To develop your career, you need to create a solid but flexible foundation.

position3.upright: Four of Pentacles, you cannot control the natural cycles of economic fluctuations or the need for security.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Four of Pentacles indicates that their anxieties or financial constraints sometimes come from external factors.
position3.context: You can't change economic fluctuations in your career.

position4.upright: The Four of Pentacles shows that you protect your resources and work with discipline. You have a consistent effort.
position4.reversed: The Reversed Four of Pentacles can limit performance by excessive conservatism and risk aversion.
position4.context: Effort combined with consistency produces sustainable success.

position5.upright: The Four of Pentacles, carefully managing your resources and creating security creates beneficial change in your career.
position5.reversed: Reversed Four of Pentacles, you should share more instead of being too conservative.
position5.context: For change in your career, you must manage your resources balancedly.

position6.upright: Four of Pentacles, excessive conservatism or risk aversion may have limited your career in the past.
position6.reversed: The Reversed Four of Pentacles, lack of sharing, and overcontrol may have created obstacles in the past.
position6.context: Excessive control or fears in the past are affecting your career today.

position7.upright: The Four of Pentacles indicates that the outcome of the career journey will be to establish security and stability.
position7.reversed: The Reversed Four of Pentacles can lead to missed opportunities as a result of excessive conservatism or control.
position7.context: The result will be moving forward with a secure foundation.

position1.upright: The Five of Pentacles symbolizes hardship and deprivation. You may be experiencing anxiety or temporary losses in your career.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Five of Pentacles indicates a process of finding support and recovery.
position1.context: Your true career will be revealed where you can overcome difficulties with solidarity.

position2.upright: The Five of Pentacles tells you that you should not hesitate to ask for help to improve. You can overcome difficulties with solidarity.
position2.reversed: The reversed Five of Pentacles indicates that it is time to recover and find support.
position2.context: You must learn to get support to develop your career.

position3.upright: Five of Pentacles, some financial difficulties or lack of support you cannot control.
position3.reversed: Inverted Five of Pentacles, the timing of recovery opportunities develops outside of you.
position3.context: Some financial losses or lack of support are inevitable in your career.

position4.upright: The Five of Pentacles shows that you continue to work despite difficulties; You are resilient.
position4.reversed: Inverted Five of Pentacles, not asking for help can reduce the effectiveness of the effort; get support.
position4.context: Effort combined with support transcends the threshold of difficulty.

position5.upright: The Five of Pentacles, asking for help and seeking solidarity despite difficulties brings beneficial change in your career.
position5.reversed: Inverted Five of Pentacles, you must learn to ask for support instead of being alone.
position5.context: You must be open to help for change in your career.

position6.upright: Five of Pentacles, financial difficulties or lack of support in the past may have hindered your career.
position6.reversed: Inverted Five of Pentacles, being alone or not asking for help may have limited you in the past.
position6.context: Past difficulties may have hindered your current career.

position7.upright: The Five of Pentacles indicates that the outcome of the career journey will be to bounce back from difficulties with solidarity and support.
position7.reversed: The Five of Pentacles reversed can make the process difficult as a result of loneliness or lack of help.
position7.context: The result will be bouncing back from difficulties with support.

position1.upright: The Six of Pentacles symbolizes generosity and mutual support. Cooperation and sharing stand out in his career.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Six of Pentacles may indicate unbalanced relationships or unequal sharing.
position1.context: Your real career is the one built on fair sharing and mutual support.

position2.upright: The Six of Pentacles suggests sharing and using your generosity for growth. Solidarity will make you stronger.
position2.reversed: The Reversed Six of Pentacles indicates that it can prevent the development of unfair or one-sided relationships.
position2.context: To develop your career, you must share fairly and cooperate.

position3.upright: Six of Pentacles, you cannot control the amount of support or assistance you receive. The generosity of others is in their hands.
position3.reversed: Inverted Six of Pentacles, unfair divisions or imbalances develop outside of you.
position3.context: You don't determine the support or generosity of others in your career.

position4.upright: The Six of Pentacles indicates strengthening performance through fair sharing and mutual support.
position4.reversed: The Reversed Six of Talisman can weaken the motivation for unbalanced shopping and unseen labor.
position4.context: Your efforts are at their best when you receive fair recognition and support.

position5.upright: The Six of Pentacles brings beneficial change in the career of fair sharing and mutual support.
position5.reversed: Inverted Six of Pentacles, you should choose fair sharing over unbalanced relationships.
position5.context: For change in your career, you must establish fair relationships.

position6.upright: Six of Pentacles, unfair relationships or unbalanced assistance may have hindered your career in the past.
position6.reversed: Inverted Six of Pentacles, unrequited efforts can be an obstacle from the past.
